mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO pa_paper_question (id, create_date, content, extra_content, extra_content_media_url, answer, correct_answer, question_type, content_media_url, answer_media_url, difficulity, subject_code, publish_code, grade_code, volume_code, unit_code, section_code, explanation, pos, score, publish, super_question_id, paper, parent_question, correct_branch, incorrect_branch, finished_branch, unfinished_branch, book_id, book_unit_id, book_section_id, group_id, group_title, knowledge, uuid, modify_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{content}, #{extraContent}, #{extraContentMediaUrl}, #{answer}, #{correctAnswer}, #{questionType}, #{contentMediaUrl}, #{answerMediaUrl}, #{difficulity}, #{subjectCode}, #{publishCode}, #{gradeCode}, #{volumeCode}, #{unitCode}, #{sectionCode}, #{explanation}, #{pos}, #{score}, #{publish}, #{superQuestionId}, #{paper}, #{parentQuestion}, #{correctBranch}, #{incorrectBranch}, #{finishedBranch}, #{unfinishedBranch}, #{bookId}, #{bookUnitId}, #{bookSectionId}, #{groupId}, #{groupTitle}, #{knowledge}, #{uuid}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
UPDATE pa_paper_question SET
create_date=#{createDate},
content=#{content},
extra_content=#{extraContent},
extra_content_media_url=#{extraContentMediaUrl},
answer=#{answer},
correct_answer=#{correctAnswer},
question_type=#{questionType},
content_media_url=#{contentMediaUrl},
answer_media_url=#{answerMediaUrl},
difficulity=#{difficulity},
subject_code=#{subjectCode},
publish_code=#{publishCode},
grade_code=#{gradeCode},
volume_code=#{volumeCode},
unit_code=#{unitCode},
section_code=#{sectionCode},
explanation=#{explanation},
pos=#{pos},
score=#{score},
publish=#{publish},
super_question_id=#{superQuestionId},
paper=#{paper},
parent_question=#{parentQuestion},
correct_branch=#{correctBranch},
incorrect_branch=#{incorrectBranch},
finished_branch=#{finishedBranch},
unfinished_branch=#{unfinishedBranch},
book_id=#{bookId},
book_unit_id=#{bookUnitId},
book_section_id=#{bookSectionId},
group_id=#{groupId},
group_title=#{groupTitle},
knowledge=#{knowledge},
uuid=#{uuid},
modify_date=#{modifyDate},
id = #{id} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pa_paper_question WHERE paper = #{args[0],javaType=java.lang.String} AND question IS NOT NULL
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM pa_paper_question WHERE paper = #{args[0],javaType=java.lang.String} AND question IS NULL ORDER BY pos
SELECT * FROM pa_paper_question WHERE paper = #{args[0],javaType=java.lang.String} AND question IS NULL ORDER BY pos
SELECT id FROM pa_paper_question WHERE paper = #{args[0],javaType=java.lang.String} AND question IS NULL ORDER BY pos
